mappoints_value.pointdata: One of Rome's most famous buildings and enduring monuments to the culture of the ancient Romans.
With a past that pre-dates the city itself, Rome's Palatine Hill holds an important place in the history of the Eternal City.
The Pantheon is the best preserved building from ancient Rome.

post_series.name: Travel to Italy
post_series.description: One of the best ways to learn about Italy is through the words of people who live here. And lucky for you, there’s no shortage of great bloggers who live in Italy and want to share their passion for the country. These are tips and articles written by real people who have a genuine desire to share their experiences. We’ve narrowed down this list to some of the best blogs that give you glimpses into the Italian life that you might otherwise miss, if you’re visiting or live in Italy.

post.post_content: KML is a file format used to display geographic data in a mapping application, such as Google Maps for mobile. You can create KML files to pinpoint locations, add image overlays, and expose rich data in new ways. KML is an international standard maintained by the Open Geospatial Consortium, Inc. (OGC). The KML file specifies a set of features like place marks, images, polygons, 3D models, textual descriptions, etc. for display in Here Maps, Google Earth, Maps and Mobile, or any other geospatial software implementing the KML encoding. Each place always has a longitude and a latitude. Other data can make the view more specific, such as tilt, heading, altitude, which together define a "camera view" along with a timestamp or timespan. KML shares some of the same structural grammar as GML. Some KML information cannot be viewed in Google Maps or Mobile.

PhotoGrid

Thanks to the Photo Grid functionality in WPVoyager, you'll be able to arrange images into a flexible grid. The grid is responsive, it will adapt to the device the site is viewed on. Using our shortcode generator, you just need to upload and select images you want to use in the grid (using default Media section in WordPress) and that's all. The rest is done by the script. Very handy, isn't it? [photogrid ids="204,203,202,204,203,202" captions="yes" columns="three" fullwidth="yes" ] Donec aliquet tortor ut cursus tristique. Mauris ut laoreet metus, sed lacinia odio. You can use custom styles for maps in your post. Google Maps Api offers this possibility, and we've added to our TravellerPress plugin option to store and choose styles for your maps. This allows you to pick a style that matches your website perfectly. There are two big sites with pre-made styles: Snazzy Maps and Mapstylr where you can choose and copy style you want, but you can also design your own style using Styled Map Wizard
[photogrid ids="204,203,202" captions="yes" columns="two" fullwidth="yes" ]

page.post_content:
[column width="eight" place="first"]

Creating map elements

You can create detailed maps full of markers, lines to highlight roads and polygons to show areas, everything is created by you using maps tools build in Post editor. Thanks to autocomplete feature, adding markers is extremly easy. You just type the address and choose one of the suggestions from Google Maps API. Confirm the address from the dropdown, and it will fill the Latitude and Longitude fields. Not sure what the address was? Just drag and drop the marker to the area you want, and all the location will be translated to address and latitude/longitude. Drawing polylines or polyareas is also extremly easy, you just click on the map to add points that are then changed to lines/areas, each point can be moved and removed if you want to edit the line before finishing it. [/column][column width="eight" place="last"]

Check the video

[embed width="580"]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xaJCnbgNEuE[/embed] (please watch it in fullscreen)[/column]

mappoints_value.pointaddress: Rome, Metropolitan City of Rome, Italy
Via Eugenio Di Mattei, 72, 00135 Roma, Italy

nav_menu_item.post_content: Paris is one of those places for me – I fall in love with it over and over again every time I go. The first time I visited Paris was in high school on a school trip. There was something about the French culture that I just loved. Having been back a couple times – I can’t resist its charm. I went back in my early 20s to party with friends but this trip was a little different.

Paris is one of those places for me – I fall in love with it over and over again every time I go. The first time I visited Paris was in high school on a school trip. There was something about the French culture that I just loved. Having been back a couple times – I can’t resist its charm. I went back in my early 20s to party with friends but this trip was a little different.
